name: google_jobs_search
description: Scrape SERP results from a Google Jobs search.

query.description: Parameter defines the query you want to search.

gl.description: Parameter defines the country to use for the Google search. It's a two-letter country code such as "us" and "uk"

api_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: google_jobs_listing_search
description: Scrape SERP results by job id from a Google Jobs Listing search.

job_id.description: Parameter defines the job_id string which can be obtained from google_jobs_search.

api_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
